News

Announcements, paper acceptances, talks, and lab highlights.

2025

  1. DFG Funds Research on Reliable AI for Open-World Object Detection
    Jun 13, 2025 Project DFG UOS

    The German Research Foundation (DFG) has approved funding for a new research project led by Matthias Rottmann at Osnabrück University.

    Read more

  2. New paper on Shape Bias & Robustness Evaluation released
    Mar 16, 2025 Paper

    Our work on Shape Bias & Robustness Evaluation via Cue Decomposition for Image Classification and Segmentation was published.

    Paper Project page

  3. ICCV2025 Paper Acceptance
    Jun 26, 2025 ICCV2025 Paper

    Our work "TARS: Traffic-Aware Radar Scene Flow Estimation" by Jialong Wu , Marco Braun, Dominic Spata and Matthias Rottmann (Aptiv, Bergische Universität Wuppertal) has been accepted for publication at ICCV2025.

    Paper Project page

  1. Team Event in Bochum
    Jun 13, 2025 Team event

    Our team headed underground at the German Mining Museum to see massive, century-old machinery in action and learn about 200 years of Ruhr region mining history—all while escaping the summer heat above.

    Read more
